onInputQueueCreated(android.view.InputQu.Description: Called when the given InputQueue is now associated with the thread making this call, so it can start receiving events from it.

onInputQueueDestroyed(android.view.Input.Description: Called when the given InputQueue is no longer associated with the thread and thus not dispatching events.

ClassDesc: Interface to receive notification of when an InputQueue is associated and dissociated with a thread.
